author: Adrianna Adarme
title: Burger Sauce Recipe
instructions_list: Dice up the pickles. If you want it smaller, feel free to mince it. I like it a bit chunky so I keep it diced.
Add all of the ingredients to a small bowl and mix up. Add this sauce to smash burgers, Big Macs, animal-style French fries and more. Store in an airtight container for up to two weeks.
description: Use this burger sauce recipe for your favorite Smash Burgers, Shake Shake Copycat Burgers, Big Macs or animal-style fries. It's super easy to mix up and smother on all your favorite diner classics.
